pages.text: $(item)Fish Fighter Enchantment (Lv.1-5)$() can be found in dungeon, end city, or village chests:$(br)$(li) Dungeon chests: Can drop Lv.3-5 $(item)Fish Fighter Enchantment$().$(br)$(li) Abandoned mineshafts, end cities, or shipwrecks: Can drop Lv.4-5 $(item)Fish Fighter Enchantment$().
$(li) Village chests: Can drop Lv.1-3 $(item)Fish Fighter Enchantment$().
